    • Method Detail

      • createCoupon

        void createCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws CouponSystemException
        This method insert a new coupon into the data base (Coupon table) Before the method insert the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - a coupon object with all the relevant information to be inserted. The id is automatically given and updated back into the object
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • removeCoupon

        void removeCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws CouponSystemException
        This method delete a coupon from the data base. The delete process is as follow: 1.Customer_Coupon 2.Company_Coupon 3.Coupon 1.Delete all the relevant records from Customer_Coupon table 2.Delete all the relevant records from Company_Coupon table 3.Delete all the relevant records from Coupon table Before the method delete the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon to be deleted
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • updateCoupon

        void updateCoupon(Coupon coupon)
           throws CouponSystemException
        This method update the information of a coupon. Before the method update the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - The coupon to be updated
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • getCoupon

        Coupon getCoupon(long id)
          throws CouponSystemException
        This method return a coupon object based on the id it gets as a parameter. the method retrieves the information from the db create a coupon object and return it. Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Parameters:
        id - - The coupon id to return
        Returns:
        - Return a coupon object
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

                                    throws CouponSystemException
        This method returns a collection of all the coupons. the method retrieves the information from the db create a collection of all the coupons and return it. Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Returns:
        - Return a collection of all the coupons
        Throws:

      • checkDbExistence

        boolean checkDbExistence(Coupon coupon)
                  throws CouponSystemException
        This method checks if a coupon with the same title already exists in the DB. in case there is it return true otherwise false Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Parameters:
        coupon - - the coupon that its title need to check
        Returns:
        - Return true if the title of the coupon already exists in the DB otherwise false
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • getCouponsUpToDate

        java.util.Collection<Coupon> getCouponsUpToDate(java.util.Date upToDate)
                                         throws CouponSystemException
        This method return a collection of coupons based on the date it gets as a parameter Before the method retrieves the information it gets a connection from the connection pool and once it finishes or we get an exception the connection is return back.
        Parameters:
        upToDate - - The date of coupons that need to return (less or equals to the date)
        Returns:
        - Return a collection of coupons based on the date it gets as a parameter
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it

      • getCouponIdFromName

        long getCouponIdFromName(java.lang.String title)
                  throws CouponSystemException
        This Method return the Id that the DB gave at the time the coupon was created.
        Parameters:
        title - - The title of the coupon its id you ask
        Returns:
        - Return the id of the coupon.
        Throws:
        CouponSystemException - - throws a general exception with a message and the original SQLException that causes it
